channel.title: stuff on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in stuff on Barefoot Rob

item.title: State of My Life Address
item.description: 07:44 Wednesday 06 February 2019 JST Lin and I still have our cat Jennie, still keep her in at night, still live in Asao-ku near the bottom of a hill. I’m still working on Marble Track 3, trying to do at least 2 hours of livestream per week. I have been working on AB, getting tests added to cover the important parts of the codebase. I do not have a lot covered, but 10 tests is an order of magnitude more than 0.

item.title: yesterday, written today
item.description: Tuesday 08 May 2018 JST (written 10:21 Wednesday 09 May 2018 JST) I spent a bit over an hour on MT3 yesterday. At least half of that time was spent thinking about what each character should do next. I did not finish all my Complice stuff; I think I have overloaded it with too many tasks each day. Great Tokyo men’s circle last night, despite the rain. The new man from last week attended again and had great insights on the problem I presented to the circle.

item.title: aint written in a while (warning blood) NSFL
item.description: 15:04 Monday 12 February 2018 JST Been working on MT3 pretty consistently, and started working on AB again now that the new verbal agreement has started. Recently I found complice (referral link) which seems like a pretty good system for organizing my day and stuff. I have 19 days in my free test period. Complice has a slight learning curve, but built-in pomodoros plus a magic way that when I open a new tab it reminds me what my latest thing to do is.

item.title: progressing
item.description: 08:32 Sunday 21 May 2017 JST My Zcoin progress I could not get Zcash to run on Debian inside virtualbox on Amazon EC2 because they do not support nested virtualization. I tried just using AWS as the provider and using Vagrant locally, but I kept getting an error like 「this box is not available on requested provider」(using Japanese quotes because it is not an actual quote). So I tried spinning up a Debian box directly on Amazon with Ansible.

item.title: other stuff
item.description: 22:48 Wednesday 19 October 2016 JST I’m trying to scp images from my Android phone to b.robnugen.com I stubbed and bloodied my toe on an escalator in Torihama station I voted for Andrew Basiago I just got back from staffing MKP in OZ Cine’s long time friend from back home suddenly died today.

item.title: wow amazing collection
item.description:
##02:13 Sunday 21 December 2014 JST## Okay, this guy’s house is a bit like a museum. He said he’s 82 years old, and has been collecting this all his adult life.
It’s all just in his house. I want to get a Japanese-speaking historian to interview this guy and something something something I don’t know what.

item.title: Mailed stuff to Fred and Soness
item.description: ##15:15 Friday 21 November 2014 JST## I just mailed Fred’s calendar and stuff to Soness’s accountant. Afterward, I ate an ankoman, an american dog, and drank piru kuru.
